articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Suryakumar can win India ODI World Cup: Ponting - Rediff.com
articles.description: Australian batting great Ricky Ponting feels Suryakumar Yadav has the ability to 'win' the ODI World Cup for India and the selectors should stick to him despite his woeful run in 50-overs cricket.
articles.content:
IMAGE: T20 batting sensation Suryakumar Yadav is yet to recreate his magic in One-Day Internationals, with 172 runs in the 50-overs format at an average of just 12.28. Photograph: BCCI
